option.name: /Default/CodeStyle/Naming/CppNaming/Rules/=Classes_0020and_0020structs/@EntryIndexedValue
option.value: <NamingElement Priority="1"><Descriptor Static="Indeterminate" Constexpr="Indeterminate" Const="Indeterminate" Volatile="Indeterminate" Accessibility="NOT_APPLICABLE"><type Name="__interface" /><type Name="class" /><type Name="struct" /></Descriptor><Policy Inspect="True" Prefix="" Suffix="" Style="AaBb" /></NamingElement>
